description: This is a web page source file for a Database Viewer UI, providing frontend code to browse and visualize database tables and data.
external_files: API endpoints (assumed to be backend services at /api/... URLs)

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Triggers reload of database list and resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the table list for a database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a specific table and renders it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for a single cell, handling object and long text display.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
